original_title: Umphrey's McGee: Live At Red Rocks
overview: Umphrey’s McGee was back and better than ever for this blowout at the storied Red Rocks Amphitheatre. Playing to a near capacity crowd, UM rose to the occasion and brought the thunder. Shot in stunning HD, these videos encapsulate the essence of the band: raw yet precise, energetic yet focused, relaxed yet tight.  Including Radiohead’s Weird Fishes/Arpeggi, the band mixed old classics with fresh material for an engaging and raucous show.  Hold on tight. Rage. Rest. Repeat.
title: Umphrey's McGee: Live At Red Rocks
